content.raw:
OK, thanks for info. Nate wrote “We check the distance from the robot” so is it possible that if you are at some corner it would fail?

‌

```
135.588000000 INFO /subt_solution [/home/developer/subt_solution/src/subt_seed/src/subt_seed_node.cc:403(getSpeedCmd)] [topics: ] Python3: stdout Waiting for origin ... 
135.640000000 INFO /subt_solution [/home/developer/subt_solution/src/subt_seed/src/subt_seed_node.cc:403(getSpeedCmd)] [topics: ] Python3: stdout Origin: [-5.0, -8.0, 0.075941] C10F100F400F1000L 

325.072000000 INFO /subt_solution [/home/developer/subt_solution/src/subt_seed/src/subt_seed_node.cc:403(getSpeedCmd)] [topics: ] Python3: stdout Final xyz: (-3.246876248876756, 2.3147173289336958, 0.16469927643030938) 
325.072000000 INFO /subt_solution [/home/developer/subt_solution/src/subt_seed/src/subt_seed_node.cc:403(getSpeedCmd)] [topics: ] Python3: stdout Final xyz (DARPA coord system): (-8.246876248876756, -5.685282671066304, 0.24064027643030939)

328.476000000 INFO /subt_solution [/home/developer/subt_solution/src/subt_seed/src/subt_seed_node.cc:403(getSpeedCmd)] [topics: ] Python3: stdout Origin: None C10F100F400F1000L
```

so can you go to particular coordinates?
